TopicTitle: Not your typical, not your typical multiplayer thread.

Articles.Content:
Multiple people flying multiple vessels will not work. (Correction: It's been worked around with a mod)

Why not make it possible for two or three (sessions would be small) people to build a rocket together in the VAB, and fly it together? One person would assume flight control, others assuming "flight engineer" positions, responsible for looking after fuel, electrical, and whatever other systems are implemented in the future. Of course how you decide to role play it is up to you.

Not hoping for much, except a thread lock and possible ban. Hopefully not though

Happy flying.

Edited November 12, 2013 by hotcrazyfruit

Multiple people flying multiple vessels is working.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55835-Kmp-0-22-wip-alpha

Best of luck.

I stand corrected on my opening statement.

After consideration and talks with my KSP buddies, we feel as though if there were to be multiplayer at all, this ought to be the way to have it. Multiple people, flying one vessel.

The role playing is endless.

The [thread=36863]WNTS list[/thread] is there for a reason. Although, must say, that mod does make things look pretty promising for the future. For the time being, though, while you are free to open a [Discussion] topic about multiplayer, you still aren't allowed to post a [suggestion] for it. That mod's likely going to be popular enough for the developers to see it at one point or other, I think, but whether or not they decide to actually have KSP as a multiplayer game in its stock form is entirely up to them.

Sorry, but I'm gonna have to lock this.
